transpile

Interface Transpiler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ToJava, ToPython

    public interface Transpiler
    These transpilers' goal is to convert the Expression AST into callable functions in various languages/forms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String expressionToString(Expression e)
      An intermediary helper function which transforms an Expression into a general arithmetic form that many languages are happy to parse.
      java.lang.String transpile(Expression e)
      The abstract function which will perform the transpilation.
      default void transpileToFile(java.lang.String fileName, Expression e)
      An wrapper function which will not only transpile an Expression, but also save it as an appropriate source file.

    • Method Detail

      • transpile

        java.lang.String transpile(Expression e)
        The abstract function which will perform the transpilation. A transpiler should be prepared to accept an arbitrary Expression and return a string containing the output code.
        Parameters:
        e - The Expression to be transpiled.
        Returns:
        A string containing the transpiled code.
        See Also:
        Expression

      • expressionToString

        static java.lang.String expressionToString(Expression e)
        An intermediary helper function which transforms an Expression into a general arithmetic form that many languages are happy to parse.
        Parameters:
        e - The Expression to be intermediately transformed.
        Returns:
        An arithmetic representation of the Expression, which respects its internal order of operations.
        See Also:
        Expression

      • transpileToFile

        default void transpileToFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                             Expression e)
        An wrapper function which will not only transpile an Expression, but also save it as an appropriate source file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the destination file, including extention.
        e - The Expression to transpile.
        See Also:
        transpile(Expression), Expression
